title: Reading Time Estimator
description: Estimate how long it takes to read any text.
placeholder: e.g. Paste a script or article here.

helper.text: Counts words by whitespace and estimates the time based on your speed.

result.empty: Enter text to calculate the reading time.

tips: Split long articles into sections for accuracy.
For scripts, use a slightly faster WPM than speaking speed.
Adjust the WPM to match your audience.
